author: Staff Reporter
text:
Actor and comedian Kumarimuthu died early on Monday morning at a private hospital. He was 77.

He was reportedly admitted to the hospital on February 27 and was suffering from age-related ailments. He has acted in hundreds of Tamil movies, and made his presence felt in Telugu and Malayalam movies too.

In his tryst with politics, the actor had been a part of the Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam.

He is survived by three daughters and a son.

Nadigar Sangam president Nasser and vice-president Ponvannan are among those from the film fraternity who offered their condolences to his family.
title: Comedian Kumarimuthu dies at the age of 77
